job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Step into the role of Digital Business Developer at ABN AMRO's Personal Banking. Drive digital transformation by understanding client needs and crafting seamless online experiences. Take charge of strategic recommendations and elevate our app and web services. If creating customer-centric solutions excites you, this is your chance to make a difference!, As a Digital Business Developer, you will be part of a specialized team with other Business Developers. You will focus on improving the user experience of our clients in our digital channels (app & web). You achieve this by translating customer needs into value propositions and comprehensive end-to-end solutions. These solutions encompass the entire process from initial concept to final implementation, ensuring they are aligned with the latest developments in technology, digitalization, legislation, and regulations. Additionally, you consider the requirements and frameworks set by both internal and external stakeholders, including development teams and regulatory bodies., The Grid Digital Channels Personal Banking has about 400 professionals from over 25 nationalities. The spoken language is Dutch and English. We are responsible for Internet Banking, the ABN AMRO app and new digital initiatives. At this moment, we are working hybrid from home and some days at the Gustav Mahlerlaan in Amsterdam. We believe that a flexible approach with multidisciplinary teams focusing on speed, flexibility and efficiency will help in our digital transformation. You will work in a pool of Business Developers with a dedicated focus on one of the teams within the Grid. Here you will be part of a scrum team using an Agile way of working:
     * Being part of four multidisciplinary dev-ops teams.
     * Informal atmosphere with lots of room for fun.
     * An environment that simulates to embrace failures as a necessary step to learn quickly.
     * Working together as a dynamic multi-cultural team.

   We know one thing about the future of banking: it is all about being a personal bank in a digital age. Our digital channels play a key role: not only showing our customers their transactions, but also in helping them make the right decisions with personalized content. That is why we work hard at ABN AMRO to bring our services to the digital environment, offering customers the seamless digital experience they deserve., We are looking for a Digital Business Developer with an affinity for customer experience, who wants to bring our digital offering (app and web) to the next level!
   If you are interested in this role, let's arrange to meet to see how your profile matches what we are looking for.
   For job related questions you can contact Manouk Klaassen (a.i. Lead PO Business Developer Pool). We look forward to meeting you!

Equal opportunities for all

   The success of our organisation depends on the quality of our people and the ideas that they have. Truly surprising insights and innovative solutions for our clients result from an interplay of cultures, knowledge and experience. Diversity is therefore extremely important to our organisation. To ensure that everyone at ABN AMRO can develop their talents, we encourage an inclusive culture in which all colleagues feel engaged and appreciated.
job_details.full_text:
Digital Business Developer

Step into the role of Digital Business Developer at ABN AMRO's Personal Banking. Drive digital transformation by understanding client needs and crafting seamless online experiences. Take charge of strategic recommendations and elevate our app and web services. If creating customer-centric solutions excites you, this is your chance to make a difference!, As a Digital Business Developer, you will be part of a specialized team with other Business Developers. You will focus on improving the user experience of our clients in our digital channels (app & web). You achieve this by translating customer needs into value propositions and comprehensive end-to-end solutions. These solutions encompass the entire process from initial concept to final implementation, ensuring they are aligned with the latest developments in technology, digitalization, legislation, and regulations. Additionally, you consider the requirements and frameworks set by both internal and external stakeholders, including development teams and regulatory bodies., The Grid Digital Channels Personal Banking has about 400 professionals from over 25 nationalities. The spoken language is Dutch and English. We are responsible for Internet Banking, the ABN AMRO app and new digital initiatives. At this moment, we are working hybrid from home and some days at the Gustav Mahlerlaan in Amsterdam. We believe that a flexible approach with multidisciplinary teams focusing on speed, flexibility and efficiency will help in our digital transformation. You will work in a pool of Business Developers with a dedicated focus on one of the teams within the Grid. Here you will be part of a scrum team using an Agile way of working:
     * Being part of four multidisciplinary dev-ops teams.
     * Informal atmosphere with lots of room for fun.
     * An environment that simulates to embrace failures as a necessary step to learn quickly.
     * Working together as a dynamic multi-cultural team.

   We know one thing about the future of banking: it is all about being a personal bank in a digital age. Our digital channels play a key role: not only showing our customers their transactions, but also in helping them make the right decisions with personalized content. That is why we work hard at ABN AMRO to bring our services to the digital environment, offering customers the seamless digital experience they deserve., We are looking for a Digital Business Developer with an affinity for customer experience, who wants to bring our digital offering (app and web) to the next level!
   If you are interested in this role, let's arrange to meet to see how your profile matches what we are looking for.
   For job related questions you can contact Manouk Klaassen (a.i. Lead PO Business Developer Pool). We look forward to meeting you!

Equal opportunities for all

   The success of our organisation depends on the quality of our people and the ideas that they have. Truly surprising insights and innovative solutions for our clients result from an interplay of cultures, knowledge and experience. Diversity is therefore extremely important to our organisation. To ensure that everyone at ABN AMRO can develop their talents, we encourage an inclusive culture in which all colleagues feel engaged and appreciated.

job_profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on business development, client needs, and digital transformation within a banking context, rather than core AI/ML engineering tasks. While it mentions technology and digitalization, it lacks specific details about AI model development, data engineering, or MLOps required for ML or GenAI roles.

phrases: Drive digital transformation by understanding client needs and crafting seamless online experiences
Take charge of strategic recommendations and elevate our app and web services
translating customer needs into value propositions and comprehensive end-to-end solutions
aligned with the latest developments in technology, digitalization, legislation, and regulations
consider the requirements and frameworks set by both internal and external stakeholders
focusing on speed, flexibility and efficiency will help in our digital transformation
being a personal bank in a digital age
bringing our services to the digital environment, offering customers the seamless digital experience they deserve
bring our digital offering (app and web) to the next level!
job_tasks.justification: These phrases highlight the role's focus on understanding business goals, client needs, market trends, and translating them into strategic initiatives and solutions within the digital banking space.

phrases: crafting seamless online experiences
comprehensive end-to-end solutions
from initial concept to final implementation
improving the user experience of our clients in our digital channels (app & web)
responsible for Internet Banking, the ABN AMRO app and new digital initiatives
work in a pool of Business Developers with a dedicated focus on one of the teams within the Grid
part of a scrum team using an Agile way of working
multidisciplinary dev-ops teams
bringing our services to the digital environment
job_tasks.justification: The job involves conceptualizing and overseeing the implementation of digital solutions, focusing on user experience in apps and web services, and working within development teams and agile frameworks.

phrases: part of a specialized team with other Business Developers
part of a scrum team
multidisciplinary dev-ops teams
working together as a dynamic multi-cultural team
working together as a dynamic multi-cultural team
interplay of cultures, knowledge and experience
inclusive culture in which all colleagues feel engaged and appreciated
soft_skills.justification: The description emphasizes working in teams, collaborating with diverse professionals, and fostering an inclusive environment.

phrases: aligned with the latest developments in technology, digitalization, legislation, and regulations
embrace failures as a necessary step to learn quickly
digital transformation
soft_skills.justification: The role requires staying updated with technological and regulatory changes and adopting a learning mindset from failures.

phrases: translating customer needs into value propositions and comprehensive end-to-end solutions
focusing on speed, flexibility and efficiency
helping them make the right decisions with personalized content
soft_skills.justification: The role involves translating complex needs into actionable solutions and optimizing processes for efficiency and customer benefit.

phrases: Drive digital transformation
Take charge of strategic recommendations
elevate our app and web services
new digital initiatives
bring our digital offering (app and web) to the next level!
innovative solutions for our clients
soft_skills.justification: The job description repeatedly calls for driving change, taking initiative, and improving digital offerings, indicating a need for ownership and innovation.
